questions.question_text: You can use standard reports when creating Dashboards

discussion.content: By standard reports what is meant is the default reports that salesforce creates for you. Note that they are not talking about "report types" but actual reports stored in standard report folders.

Selected Answer: A
You can create a dashboard item based on standard reports already in Salesforce (meaning you don't even have to create a report first) or based on customized reports that you create.

Selected Answer: A
it is possible to create dashboard on standard reports
